task.title: How to Change Privacy Restictions
task.shortdesc: This task will show you how to change privacy restricitions in a Mypack profile

taskbody.prereq: You must have access to a Mypack profile account

context.p: Under the Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act (FERPA), you have the right to restrict all or part of your directory information, which includes your preferred email, your enrollment status (full-time/part-time), major field of study, and more.

step.cmd: From the Left-Hand Navigation Menu, Select "Privacy Restrictions"

substep.cmd: Select "Restrict" Under the Directory Field You Would Like To Restrict Access To A Certain Field
Select "Clear" If You Wish To Release The Restriction For That Field

step.cmd: Granting Exceptions In a Full Privacy Block

substep.cmd: To Grant Exceptions, Click the Full Privacy Block Field, Check the Restricted Box, and Select Desired Exceptions
substep.info: Select a “full privacy” block to prevent us from sharing your information with anyone, including employers. A full privacy block also prevents your inclusion in graduation and Dean's List publications.

step.cmd: click the green "Save" button to save your changes
